general_info.summary: This text lists various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University, covering academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences, School of Medical Sciences & Research, and Sharda School of Nursing Science & Research, alongside administrative and support functions such as examination reports, academic bank of credits, curricula feedback, university brochures, leadership information, tenders, legal documents, and various skill enhancement and awareness programs. It also mentions specific outreach like FM Radio Suno Sharda and international campuses in Uzbekistan and Agra, as well as specialized services like family and couple counseling, and courses on human values and professional ethics.
